description: This course involves a critical examination of the legal and practical issues involved in the financing of international commercial transactions including relevant financial instruments, the role of banks and financial institutions, payment systems, and international regimes.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24), MICLaw
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
